post: The Italian chapter of CSICOP, i.e. CICAP has just held a conference in Abano Terme, Italy, to celebrate its 20th anniversary. In the course of the conference, Pavia University chemist Luigi Garlaschelli produced an intriguing full size modern replica of the shroud of Turin, executed in a relatively simple manner, consistent with known Mediaeval technologies and not inconsistent with what we know about the shroud..
